text:
@realDonaldTrump Why are we still letting people in from Wuhan area?  It’s already been announced that the virus is transmissible BEFORE symptoms, yet all we’re doing is checking their temperature and letting them go spread to the masses. 

STOP THE BLEEDING and cut IB flights from all CHiNA
